text: ( CNN ) Lady Gaga has canceled the remaining dates of her Joanne World Tour due to ` ` severe pain,'' Live Nation announced Saturday. Gaga apologized to her fans on Saturday through a statement posted on Twitter, saying she needed to put her ` ` well - being first'' and plans to recover at home. ` ` All I know is that if I don't do this, I am not standing by the words or meaning of my music,'' she said. In a statement posted on the promoter's site, Live Nation said the final 10 dates of the European leg of the tour - - including next week's shows in London and Manchester - - were canceled because the severe pain that Gaga is experiencing has ` ` materially impacted her ability to perform live.'' ` ` Last night, with strong
